short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Feel Zenitsu's electrifying spirit with dynamic visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the electrifying energy of Zenitsu Agatsuma to your browser with this dynamic live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A bold interface inspired by Zenitsu’s electrifying Thunder Breathing, featuring striking yellow, orange, and white tones with lightning motifs.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that mirrors Zenitsu’s sharp and vibrant personality.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Explore Demon Slayer-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Amplify your browsing experience with features as energetic and precise as Zenitsu’s combat style.
